page.title: 12WELTON SURVEY:ATTITUDES.
page.content:
8. what do you enjoy about living in Welton? Friendly & nice people.36% Good shops 44% Nice Village 12%. Good Amenities 8%. Near to Family 12%. Near Lincoln 12%. Friends here/Social Life 12% Peace & Quiet 4%. Countryside 4%.
9. Would you prefer to live elsewhere? No 84%. Yes 16%.
10. Where did you come from if not from Welton?
Elsewhere in Lincolnshire 52% 1 person from each of the foll.: Yorkshire, Norfolk, Sussex, London, Leicestershire, Nottinghamshire.
11. Do your children go to school? 60% had children at either Primary or Secondary school levelin the village.
